channel.title: My 2nd script
channel.description: well this is my 2nd script and its for runescape and it is a thing that buys all items in a shop with a certain colour plz tell me if it works.

item.title: My 2nd script
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

I Updated it But there just a few Errors i dunno about!

{-----------------------------------------------------------------------+
  Buys all items with that color
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------}
program autobuyer;
{.include srl/srl.scar}

Const
color=14898176; // the color here  (the color picker color {of course})

procedure BuyColor(Color,Amount:Integer);
var
  x, y:Integer;
begin
  while(FindColorSpiral(x,y,Color,16,53,501,321))do
  BuyCord(x,y,amount);
end;

Begin
ActivateClient;
SetUpSRL;
Cleardebug;
Writeln('<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>');
Writeln('Working for' + (timeintostr) + '(might no be right!)');
Writeln('You are know using a color buyer!');
Writeln('by: that guy');
Writeln('Remember to have money....');
Writeln('<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>');
repeat
BuyColor(Color,Amount:Integer);
until(false)
end.

Glad i can Help!!
